subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tim Tebow said he was looking forward to seeing how the Jets intend to use him — in short yardage, in the red zone and, perhaps most prominently, in the Wildcat formation.
snippet: Tim Tebow said he was looking forward to seeing how the Jets intend to use him — in short yardage, in the red zone and, perhaps most prominently, in the Wildcat formation.
